Container.Name: Postgres9
Container.Description: The PostgreSQL object-relational database system provides reliability and data integrity. Pulls the official PostgreSQL Docker image with tag '9'.
Container.Overview: The PostgreSQL object-relational database system provides reliability and data integrity. Pulls the official PostgreSQL Docker image with tag '9'.

Config.Name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Container Variable: POSTGRES_PASSWORD, sets the superuser password

Config.Name: POSTGRES_USER
Config.Description: Container Variable: POSTGRES_USER, will create the specified user with superuser power. If it is not specified, then the default user of 'postgres' will be used

Config.Name: POSTGRES_DB
Config.Description: Container Variable: POSTGRES_DB, if it is not specified, then the value of POSTGRES_USER will be used
